text: Farmacia de guardia ("Pharmacy on Duty") is a Spanish comedy serial, originally broadcast on Antena 3 from 1991 to 1995. == Cast == * Concha Cuetos - Lourdes Cano * Carlos Larrañaga - Adolfo Segura * José Soriano - Don Enrique Cano * Maruchi León - Pili Fernández * África Gozalbes - Reyes «Queen» González * Miguel Ángel Garzón - Enrique Segura * Julián González - Guillermo Segura == Awards == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable " |- ! Year ! Award ! Category ! Nominee !
